remarks: Substitution analog of Theorem 19.20 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2005.)  Obsolete as of 17-Aug-2018.  Use ~ sbcimdv instead.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
sbcimdv.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
sbcimdvOLD $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. V ) -> ( [. A / x ]. ps -> [. A / x ]. ch ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
